article.title: Smart Mirror: Intelligent Makeup Recommendation and Synthesis

multiple_choice_question.text: What does part (c) of Figure 1 illustrate?
choices: Facial feature extraction using landmark points.
The test facial image before makeup.
Comparison of the test facial image before and after makeup synthesis.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the purpose of the Latent SVM model in the proposed makeup recommendation and synthesis system?
choices: To extract makeup-invariant facial features and attributes.
To learn the relationship between facial features, attributes, and makeup effects for personalized recommendations.
To synthesize recommended makeup onto a non-makeup face.
To extract eye shadow templates using spectral matting methods.

multiple_choice_question.text: What information is NOT depicted in Figure 3?
choices: The specific makeup products recommended by the system.
The visual effect of the synthesized makeup.
